name: Path In The Heart
description:
Introduction

Explore this beautiful and exotic deep sea world.

  - Use The Arrows to move around

- Press X to select menus and dialogue

This game is only in the Prototype phase. For now there's no dialogue and nothing to do beyond exploring the scenario. 

Find and turn on all the Light Sources:

The labyrinth will be open once you get all the 12 Light Sources.

Story 

Path in the Heart is an 2D sideview metroidvania game still in development. It tells a story from a very deep sea. It's a large story with epic proportions and mysterious mystic symbols. In this game the player follows the story of two main characters, Arrieli and Suzana. They were both born already in the deep world, they never got the chance to see how it is like to live on the surface, in fact there's a whole civilization living in the deep world and it has been like that for centuries, it's even hard for most people to believe that there is such a thing as a world over the water. However, something changed. Forever the deep world has been surrounded by a deep and persistent black background. There was no notion of “above ''. It was always incredibly dark all over, but one day the whole sea became brighter and the light was stronger the more you moved up. At this moment everyone in the deep world decided to start moving, but not necessarily up. There are many groups of people who have no interest in what is happening above and there are also some groups of people who want everyone to stay in the deep sea. There was a big conflict of ideas, people that were in power wished to maintain the status quo. There was even an imminent war between some of the states which started to explode exactly when the storyline of Arrieli and Suzana begins in the game.
